title: Unleash your creativity with Adobe apps

text.featureParagraphHtml: Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced designer, Adobe makes it easy to edit art, photography, layouts, and more

text.headingH3: Create anything you can imagine with Adobe Photoshop

text.bodyHtml:
Photoshop has come to Chromebook. This versatile digital imaging and design application is now available in your browser. With Photoshop on the web, there are more ways than ever to edit images into stunning graphics in just a few steps.

  • Bring your creative vision to life with help from generative AI, powered by Adobe Firefly. Expand the horizon or transport your photo to a new location with simple text prompts. Remove anything that doesn’t fit, and fill it with a new idea.
  • Grow your Photoshop skills with step-by-step tutorials. Or use precise, intuitive tools in the moment to walk you through creating content and images you’ll love.
  • Find many ways to swap out backgrounds, combine multiple photos together, make objects disappear, or fix flaws fast.
Try Adobe Photoshop

text.headingH3: Polish your photos with Adobe Lightroom

text.bodyHtml:
Lightroom gives you everything you need to store and organize your photography across mobile, desktop, and web. With a host of tools and tutorials, edit them like a pro.

  • Get professional edits in a single click. Choose from Adaptive Presets, new AI-powered filters, to instantly enhance your portraits, travel photos, landscapes, and more.
  • Pick and choose which parts of the photo you want to edit with Lightroom’s masking tools. Or use AI-powered features such as AI Masking and Content Aware Remove to instantly select and get rid of any part of your photo.
  • Say goodbye to flaws. Lightroom’s healing tools remove distractions and imperfections so that every photo can be picture-perfect.
  • Get step-by-step photography training from professionals and educators to make your photos pop. Or read posts and tips, all inside the app.
Try Adobe Lightroom

text.headingH3: Make stand out content with Adobe Express

text.bodyHtml:
Express is a free all-in-one app for fast and easy content creation. Get started with thousands of professionally-designed templates for social media posts and stories, marketing, education, videos, and photos.

  • Add new elements to your design or pull from Adobe Stock video footage, images, audio, and music. Premium users can choose from the entire collection of over 195 million files.
  • Import a .pdf file and start adding eye-catching text, images, and more. You can connect your CC Libraries or, with a premium account, add and apply your Brand Kit with logos, colors, and fonts for consistency.
  • Resize images, videos, and designs in just one click and schedule to post to social media. Trim and merge videos and turn them into a .gif or .mp4 file.

description: Power up your designs with Adobe’s creativity tools

title: Microsoft 365 comes to Chromebooks
subtitle: Boost productivity with Microsoft 365 and OneDrive integration

text.bodyHtml:
Easily open and edit Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files on your Chromebook using the Microsoft 365 app. OneDrive will be added to your Chromebook Files app so you can access your documents when you need them. Begin setting up Microsoft 365 on your Chromebook today.

Your Chromebook provides a guided setup experience. During setup, you’ll install the Microsoft 365 app if you don’t have it already and connect Microsoft OneDrive to your Chromebook Files app.

Once you have completed setup, any future files you open will move to Microsoft OneDrive to open in the Microsoft 365 app. Microsoft OneDrive storage is required to open and edit files in Microsoft 365.
For easy access to Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, pin Microsoft 365 to your shelf
Open and edit Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files on your Chromebook
Microsoft OneDrive integrated with the Chromebook Files app

description: Edit Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files

title: Chromebook gaming 101

text.featureParagraphHtml: Shift gears from work to play, and let the games begin!

text.headingH3: Immerse yourself in mobile games

text.bodyHtml: Experience the thrill of playing games like Roblox, Candy Crush Saga, and Geometry Dash on a larger, more immersive screen. For better control – and maybe even higher scores – connect your Works With Chromebook keyboard, gamepad, or mouse.

text.headingH3: Popular PC and console games – at your fingertips

text.bodyHtml: Play games like Lost Ark, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, Dying Light 2, and more – right on your Chromebook. Platforms such as NVIDIA GeForce NOW, Xbox Cloud Gaming, and Boosteroid connect you to thousands of popular PC and console games so you can stream the titles you already own.

description: Play your favorite mobile, PC, and console games

title: Design your own adventure with Minecraft

text.featureParagraphHtml: You can now play Minecraft Bedrock Edition on your Chromebook.* An infinitely creative sandbox where you can craft tools, buildings, and play mini-games solo or with other players.

text.headingH3: Build without limits in Creative Mode

text.bodyHtml:
Make anything you can dream up and let your imagination run wild without worrying about falling prey to enemies. Construct entire worlds, from towering skyscrapers to intricate underwater cities.

  • Focus on creating by having access to all resources without needing to gather or craft them
  • Customize game rules with commands by changing the time of day or weather
  • With the instant ability to fly, you can easily navigate and position blocks

text.headingH3: Battle zombie-like mobs in Survival Mode

text.bodyHtml:
Ready for a challenge? In Survival Mode, you’ll need to gather resources and build shelter all while defending yourself against hostile mobs.

  • Protect yourself during day-night cycles by engaging in combat or building a base to hide
  • Work for everything by being more strategic, resourceful, and adaptable
  • With the hunger system, you must eat to survive and use your energy wisely to regenerate

text.headingH3: Cross-play with friends

text.bodyHtml:
Take your gaming to the next level by playing with friends.

  • Explore the large, thriving community of players while discovering creations and custom maps
  • Use multiplayer mode to build together or embark on quests
  • Adventure with friends regardless of where they play Minecraft - desktop, console, or mobile

Pro tip: Purchasing Minecraft Bedrock Edition on your Chromebook will automatically get you access to Minecraft Pocket Edition on Android. If you’ve already purchased Minecraft Pocket Edition on an Android phone or tablet, you can easily upgrade to get it on your Chromebook. Access third-party servers to play mini-games, PVP and more.

*Minecraft is available on select Chromebooks. See here for device eligibility details.

text.featureParagraphHtml: Whether you’re a budding pianist, DJ-in-training, or veteran songwriter, learn new skills and expand your repertoire right from your Chromebook. With these music-making apps, you can follow your rhythm using a touch screen and stylus, or add a mouse and keyboard to the mix.

text.headingH3: Produce like a pro with Cubasis 3

text.bodyHtml: Create professional-level music on the go with Cubasis 3’s complete package of mixing and editing tools. Try out the built-in keyboard and drum pads, explore the app’s extensive library of virtual instruments, or record your own unique sounds. You can also connect to your own instruments, play around with effects, and easily edit and export tracks.

text.headingH3: Jam in your portable studio with Amped Studio

text.bodyHtml: Lay down audio, create fresh beats, and collaborate with others through this clever digital studio. Build arrangements with your own voice using the Hum and Beatz Note Detection: Simply hum or beatbox into the microphone, then watch the app generate a composition from your vocals. Earn money for tracks in Amped’s Marketplace, where you can buy and sell original music.

text.headingH3: Get social with your music using BandLab

text.bodyHtml: Create music, share tunes, and enter contests using this social platform for musicians. You can explore a wide range of virtual instruments and effects, or put your spin on things by remixing existing BandLab tracks and playing with the loop library. If your vocals are shakier than you’d like, the AutoPitch tool and built-in tuner will be your new best friends.

text.headingH3: Create instrumental beats for any game with Remixlive

text.bodyHtml: Seamlessly compose, import, and share music with Remixlive. Create and perform studio-quality beats with a professional looper, drum pad, step-sequencer. Plus, add new layers to your music with a range of sample packs, or clips from your own library.

text.headingH3: Learn piano essentials with Simply Piano

text.bodyHtml: Get started with piano, or hone skills at your own pace through fun lessons suited to your ability. Get your daily practice in with 5-minute “workouts,” improving your technique with the help of expert tips and real-time feedback. You can easily connect the app to your own piano, or play the built-in keyboard in the Touch Intro and Stay In Touch beginners’ courses.

text.featureParagraphHtml: Perfect your selfies, create albums, and add unique effects with feature-packed photo editing apps

text.headingH3: Relive your favorite memories with Google Photos

text.bodyHtml: Enhance your photos with filters, adjust the brightness, and create collages and movies that you can share across devices. You can even create a shared album to send to multiple people — or just one person — with partner sharing. Looking for a specific photo? Google Photos makes it easy. Just search by people, places, or objects.

text.headingH3: Faster and easier editing with Pixlr E

text.bodyHtml: Use AI-powered background removers, pro-level retouching tools, drawing brushes, and premade templates for social media. Upgrade for extra enhancements like stickers, overlays, and fonts.

text.headingH3: Your all-in-one creative solution with BeFunky

text.bodyHtml: Meet your photo editor, collage maker, and graphic design platform all in one place. Transform your selfies into oil paintings, pop art, sketches, and cartoons with BeFunky’s unique AI filters. For lighter edits, use one-click tools that remove unwanted objects from backgrounds and smooth away blemishes from portraits.

title: Your guide to video conferencing apps

text.featureParagraphHtml: Whether you’re a fan of Google Meet or are a Zoom devotee, we’ll show you the best versions of your favorite video conferencing apps

text.headingH3: Find Google Meet already on your Chromebook

text.bodyHtml: Connect with colleagues and loved ones the minute you turn on your Chromebook – no downloads required. In the corner of your screen, select the Launcher, and click the icon for Google Meet. You can also start meetings right from Gmail or Google Calendar. Enjoy interactive features like hand-raising, polls, and digital whiteboards for brainstorms or games.

text.headingH3: Get Zoom on your Chromebook

text.bodyHtml: Zoom is optimized to take up less space on your Chromebook and has the collaboration tools and virtual security features you need for your meetings.

title: A new way to play top mobile games

text.featureParagraphHtml: Level up your play with Chromebook’s immersive screen. Game on with your keyboard, mouse, and controller.

text.headingH3: Explore the ultimate virtual universe with Roblox

text.bodyHtml: Create your own identity and discover millions of ways to connect on Roblox. Find immersive experiences for every mood, from pulse-pounding races and epic battle royales to building and role-playing simulations. And with support across your devices, you can start out on your Android phone and then move to your Chromebook without missing any of the action.

text.headingH3: A sugar rush in puzzle form with Candy Crush Saga

text.bodyHtml: Line up matching candies in rows of three to clear the board in a limited number of moves. The only thing blocking your path to sweet victory? Jellies, licorices, chocolates, and other pesky obstacles. Take advantage of Chromebook’s full-width view – it scales up your rows to help you overcome the stickiest challenges and rise to the top of the leaderboard.

text.headingH3: Speed through a musical 2D runner with Geometry Dash

text.bodyHtml:
Set off on a fast-paced adventure complete with a head-bopping soundtrack. Play as one of seven forms, then fly and flip your way through treacherous levels while dodging obstacles and unlocking achievements.

Pro tip: connect a controller for more precision and to fully embrace the retro video game vibe.

text.headingH3: Plant roots in a peaceful farm sim with Stardew Valley

text.bodyHtml: Stardew Valley’s leisurely, open-ended gameplay offers a relaxing escape. Spend your days building the farm of your dreams by cultivating crops and raising happy animals. With seasonal festivals, villager quests, and hundreds of options for customizing your farmer and home, there’s plenty to do in this small town.

text.headingH3: Slay monsters with Dead Cells

text.bodyHtml: Navigate a sprawling, ever-changing castle on a mysterious island in this thrilling 2D combat game. On your quest to slay the island’s king, you’ll discover dangerous traps, precious loot, and merciless enemies lurking around every corner. But be warned – when you die, the game’s “permadeath” mechanic sends you back to the start.

text.headingH3: Survive the wilderness with Don’t Starve: Pocket Edition

text.bodyHtml: Come for the hand-drawn, moody art style and stay for the survival adventure. Play as a fearless gentleman scientist who’s trapped in a harsh and mysterious wilderness. Use your wits to scavenge for items, build your base, and survive the elements – and, of course, monster attacks.

text.headingH3: Fight your way through demons with DOOM

text.bodyHtml: Dive into this classic first-person shooter, set in a Mars research facility overrun by demonic creatures. You assume the role of Doomguy, a Marine tasked with blasting through the menacing mobs to uncover the truth behind the invasion. Staying alive in this fast-paced, bloody world is a white-knuckling experience guaranteed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

description: Immerse yourself in virtual universes, riveting puzzles, and more

text.featureParagraphHtml: These apps are optimized to deliver a seamless experience on your Chromebook. Enjoy the flexibility of using your preferred external devices such as your stylus, mouse, or keyboard.

text.bodyHtml: Unleash your creativity with these beginner-friendly apps. Get introduced to the world of digital art and photography or bring your masterpiece to life from the comfort of your Chromebook.

text.headingH3: Quick drawing and painting with Artflow

text.bodyHtml: Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned artist, unlock your creativity using Artflow’s minimalist interface. With over 100 brushes, plus smudge, fill, and eraser tools, get painting and drawing using your fingertips or favorite Chromebook stylus. Share your creations using the “record workflow” feature which allows you to create time-lapse videos of your progress from start to finish.

text.headingH3: Sketch with realistic brushes using Tayasui Sketches

text.bodyHtml:
Tap into your inner Van Gogh with ease. In addition to sketching tools, the app also comes with a collection of realistic brushes that mimic the textures of watercolor, acrylic, and oil paints. You can also use folders and layers to keep the elements of your image separated and easy to edit.

Pro tip: Tayasui Sketches works best using a Chromebook stylus with a touchscreen device.

text.headingH3: Brainstorm and refine your ideas using Concepts

text.bodyHtml: With Concepts, you get the best of both worlds – the flexibility of a traditional sketchbook and the speed and versatility of digital drawing tools. Its clean interface, endless canvas, and vector-based editing make it the ideal app for simple sketching, limitless brainstorming, and creating detailed product, building, or landscape designs. Quickly learn the app using the wealth of tutorials available on Medium and the Concepts website.

text.headingH3: Get more out of graphic design with Canva

text.bodyHtml: Canva allows anyone to be a graphic designer – no experience needed. With thousands of professionally designed templates, a library of royalty-free stock images and music, plus built-in photo editing, you can tackle a wide variety of design projects for personal or professional use. Create eye-catching posts for Instagram or TikTok. Knock out a logo for your business. Up-level your presentations and flyers.

text.headingH2: Apps for advanced creators and professionals

text.bodyHtml: Serious hobbyists and creative professionals, use your Chromebook to take your inspiration from a big idea to final execution. The following apps work seamlessly on your Chromebook and combine feature-loaded capabilities with pro-level performance.

text.headingH3: Create comics with Clip Studio Paint

text.bodyHtml: Clip Studio Paint is a popular app among comic, manga, and webtoon artists. With its vast library of lifelike and customizable brushes, time-saving layouts, speech bubbles, and perspective rulers, you’ll have everything you need to create dynamic comics for print and the web right on your Chromebook. But it’s the app’s collection of adjustable and traceable 3D models that really sets it apart. Pull one up to make sketching complex figures, objects, and backgrounds a breeze.

text.headingH3: Enhance your creations with Krita

text.bodyHtml: Krita is an open-source digital art program created by artists, for artists. While you can draw and animate in Krita, where the app shines is painting. Digital painters will love Krita’s 100 professional-grade brushes, along with its advanced brush engine that’s totally customizable and emulates classic painting mediums such as watercolor, oil, chalk, and more. Krita’s user-friendly interface includes “workspaces” that can be customized to support your unique workflow.

text.featureParagraphHtml: Create stunning videos with LumaFusion's intuitive and powerful editing suite

text.headingH3: Layer video and audio

text.bodyHtml:
Hop in the editing suite to seamlessly edit videos using a robust feature set that gives you precise control over every clip.

  • Stack up to six clips each for audio and video
  • Quickly insert, overwrite, link, and unlink clips using the enhanced magnetic timeline
  • Stay organized with custom track headers that lock, hide, or mute individual tracks
  • Cut, copy, and paste in your timeline and between projects using multiselect

text.headingH3: Bring your story to life

text.bodyHtml:
Unleash your inner filmmaker with an array of visual effects. Create a new mood for your footage or add animation by tapping into tools that help tackle post-production work.

  • Layer multiple Style, Blur, and Distort filters to create more complex effects
  • Perfect your footage with powerful color-correction tools
  • Animate effects and colors with unlimited keyframing
  • Create slow-motion/fast-motion forward and reverse

text.headingH3: Polish your audio

text.bodyHtml:
Harness simple audio tools to enhance the dialogue, music, and ambient sound.

  • Keyframe audio levels and panning for perfect mixes
  • Use Audio Ducking to automatically lower background noise during dialogue
  • Ensure clear and balanced audio with the fill-from-left/right feature

text.headingH3: Workflow features make editing life easier

text.bodyHtml:
Stay laser-focused on your editing with features and tools that help you speed up your process, find what you need, and work flexibly.

  • Import media directly from Google Drive or other cloud-based storage platforms like Dropbox
  • Explore thousands of royalty-free music options, sound effects, videos, and backgrounds in the Storyblocks Library
  • Edit in a variety of aspect ratios, including landscape, portrait, square, and widescreen
  • Work in frame rates from 18 fps to 240 fps
